categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: In the following months after the Battle of Endor, the Galactic Empire launched three invasions of the Mid Rim planet of Naboo. Due to the fact that Naboo had been Emperor Palpatine's homeworld, the planet became a rallying point for Imperial sympathizers. The Imperial Navy deployed three attack forces to wipe out the New Republic presence in the system, however, the attempts were foiled by Corona Squadron, an X-wing squadron of the New Republic Defense Fleet. During the siege, the New Republic's defense force was assisted by Imperial defectors giving tips of Imperial tactics.
The Naboo invasions first appeared in Lost Stars, a canon young adult novel written by Claudia Gray as part of Journey to Star Wars: The Force Awakens series.
